name: RetrieveCountrySpecs
description:
Retrieve all country specification objects from the API.

This tool calls the Stripe API to list all available Country Spec objects, providing information about country-specific details.

parameters.name: pagination_ending_before
parameters.description: The object ID to specify your place in the list for pagination, retrieving the previous page of results.

value_schema.description: A cursor for use in pagination. `ending_before` is an object ID that defines your place in the list. For instance, if you make a list request and receive 100 objects, starting with `obj_bar`, your subsequent call can include `ending_before=obj_bar` in order to fetch the previous page of the list.

parameters.name: expand_response_fields
parameters.description: An array of strings specifying fields in the response to be expanded for more detailed information.

value_schema.description: Specifies which fields in the response should be expanded.

parameters.name: number_of_country_specs_to_return
parameters.description: Number of country specification objects to return, ranging from 1 to 100. The default is 10.

value_schema.description: A limit on the number of objects to be returned. Limit can range between 1 and 100, and the default is 10.

parameters.name: pagination_starting_after_id
parameters.description: Object ID to define your place in the list for pagination. Use it to fetch the next page if available, based on the last object from a previous list call.

value_schema.description: A cursor for use in pagination. `starting_after` is an object ID that defines your place in the list. For instance, if you make a list request and receive 100 objects, ending with `obj_foo`, your subsequent call can include `starting_after=obj_foo` in order to fetch the next page of the list.
